nodes.lineToEdit: Don’t do that. (pause) It works, and then staff are on you. (pause) And I’ve got nothing I can file.
nodes.revisedLine: Don’t. (pause) You’ll ping staff, and they’ll swarm. (pause) Then I’m stuck here with nothing to file.
nodes.changeSummary: Made it more immediate and reactive; kept the same warning about staff response and lack of paperwork. | Shortened the second and third beats to stay under 8 words while keeping the same meaning and cadence.

nodes.lineToEdit:
You need a token. (pause)
“Access” just gets people hovering at the door (pause) and slows everything down.
nodes.revisedLine:
You need a token. (pause)
Say “access” and folks hover at the door. (pause)
Everything jams up.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the instruction and consequence, tightened into more in-the-moment phrasing. | Trimmed the second beat to 8 words by replacing “people start hovering” with “folks hover,” and made the last clause its own sentence to avoid a pause mid-sentence.

nodes.lineToEdit:
For anything out here waving the “safety” flag. (pause)
Doors. (pause)
Kiosks. (pause)
Window assignment. (pause)
What you do gets tagged “inquiry” or “interference.” (pause)
Until you’ve got paper you’re just extra. (pause)
Extra in the line. (pause)
That’s how the intake software got bought.
nodes.revisedLine:
For anything out here waving the “safety” flag. (pause)
Doors. (pause)
Kiosks. (pause)
Window assignment. (pause)
Whatever you touch gets tagged “inquiry” or “interference.” (pause)
Till you’ve got paper, you’re just extra. (pause)
Extra in the line. (pause)
That’s how the intake software got bought.
nodes.changeSummary: Light edits for natural cadence; preserved list, tags, and the intake software point.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Transfer Entitlement Receipt. (pause)
Yeah. The words are backwards. (pause)
Legal did that. Don’t ask me. (pause)
It’s the slip. (pause)
It lets the system count you. (pause)
Accounted-for mass. (pause)
Not a random narrative.
nodes.nextLine: So I need to obtain a TER.
nodes.revisedLine:
TER. Transfer Entitlement Receipt. (pause)
Yeah, the wording’s backwards. (pause)
Legal. Don’t ask me. (pause)
It’s the slip. (pause)
It lets the system count you. (pause)
Accounted-for mass. (pause)
It won’t take a whole story.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the definition and function, removed the punchline-y phrasing and made it sound more pressured.

nodes.priorLine: So I need to obtain a TER.
nodes.lineToEdit:
You need a token (pause) that resolves to a TER (pause) when the door pings it. (pause)
Say “access” (pause) and people start looking around (pause) for who’s responsible.
nodes.revisedLine:
You need a token (pause) that resolves to a TER (pause) when the door pings it. (pause)
Say “access” (pause) and people start looking around (pause) for who gets stuck owning it.
nodes.changeSummary: Maintained mechanics and the blame dynamic; made the liability pressure sharper.

nodes.lineToEdit: I believe you. (pause) Still can’t shove a mandate (pause) through a door reader. (pause) You want this quiet? (pause) Get filed first. (pause) Then do your work.
nodes.revisedLine: I hear you. (pause) Door reader doesn’t take “mandate.” (pause) You want this quiet? (pause) Get filed first. (pause) Then do your work.
nodes.changeSummary: Swapped the polished reassurance for a more clipped acknowledgment; kept the same constraint and steps.

nodes.lineToEdit: Don’t say that where it can hear. (pause) “Mandate” starts escalation loops. (pause) Someone has to own it. (pause) Tokens slide through, no name attached.
nodes.revisedLine: Don’t say that where it can hear. (pause) “Mandate” kicks off escalation loops. (pause) Then somebody has to own it. (pause) Tokens go through clean.
nodes.changeSummary: More conversational, less formal; preserved escalation/ownership risk and the token workaround.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Okay. OLEA Field Systems. (pause) Closure engineer. (pause) That helps me. (pause)
The kiosk still won’t care. (pause) It wants an artifact. (pause)
Be right all day. (pause) If you’re not in the file, (pause) the door stays shut.
nodes.nextLine:
Not you. (pause)
Something on you. Scannable. (pause)
Something that can take an incident category (pause)
without crying about it.
nodes.revisedLine:
Alright. OLEA Field Systems. (pause) Closure engineer. (pause) Helps me. (pause)
Kiosk still won’t care. (pause) It wants an artifact. (pause)
You can be right all day. (pause) If you’re not in the file, (pause) the door stays shut.
nodes.changeSummary: Reduced the explanatory tone while keeping the credential acknowledgment and the kiosk/file constraint.

nodes.priorLine:
Okay. OLEA Field Systems. (pause) Closure engineer. (pause) That helps me. (pause)
The kiosk still won’t care. (pause) It wants an artifact. (pause)
Be right all day. (pause) If you’re not in the file, (pause) the door stays shut.
nodes.lineToEdit:
Not you. (pause)
Something on you. Scannable. (pause)
Something that can take an incident category (pause)
without crying about it.
nodes.revisedLine:
Something on you. (pause)
Scannable. (pause)
Something that can take an incident category (pause)
without crying about it.
nodes.changeSummary: Trimmed the definitional opener; kept the same requirement for a scannable artifact and incident category.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Keep it low. (pause) Call it a misrouted equipment transfer. (pause) Drop “authority” and “mandate.” (pause) Don’t fight the window (pause) while they’re logging.
Get the token. (pause) Save the importance for someplace (pause) that actually files it.
nodes.revisedLine:
Keep it low. (pause) Call it “misrouted equipment transfer.” (pause) Leave “authority” and “mandate” out of it. (pause) Don’t fight the window (pause) while they’re logging.
Get the token. (pause) Save the big speech for someplace (pause) that actually files it.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the same tactical guidance; made it sound more annoyed and situational.

nodes.lineToEdit: It’s a shortcut. (pause) If it spelled it all out, (pause) you’d start negotiating with it— (pause) and then I’m stuck logging (pause) a “verbal incident.”
nodes.revisedLine: Yeah it’s shorthand. (pause) If it spelled it all out (pause) you’d start negotiating with it— (pause) and then I’m stuck logging (pause) a “verbal incident.”
nodes.changeSummary: Minimal change; swapped to more natural spoken wording while preserving the same cause/effect. | Removed extra commas after “Yeah” and “out” to meet the comma limit while keeping pauses and meaning.

nodes.priorLine: ask: Can I file as equipment?
nodes.lineToEdit: Intake can file an object. (pause) It has a barcode. (pause) And an incident category. (pause) If you can’t be listed. (pause) You attach to something that can. (pause) Then you’re—politely—“associated mass.”
nodes.revisedLine: They’ll file an object. (pause) Barcode. (pause) incident category. (pause) If you can’t be listed. (pause) You hitch yourself to something that can. (pause) Then you’re—politely—“associated mass.”
nodes.changeSummary: Collapsed institutional phrasing into shorthand while keeping the same filing workaround and term. | Removed extra comma and avoided pausing mid-sentence by splitting the conditional into two beats.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Intake Hall. (pause) Windows 0/3/5/7/9. (pause)
Pick the one. (pause)
Looks least hungry. (pause)
For your life story. (pause)
Give them an incident category. (pause)
The system will accept. (pause)
They spit out a token. (pause)
That’s what the doors listen to.
nodes.revisedLine:
Intake Hall. (pause) Windows 0/3/5/7/9. (pause)
Pick one that looks least hungry (pause)
for your life story. (pause)
Give them an incident category. (pause)
They feed it to the system. (pause)
Token prints. (pause)
That’s what the doors listen to.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept location/windows and steps; made it more spoken and less instructional, with paperwork emphasis.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Intake can’t file a person. (pause)
Not listed in any jurisdiction. (pause)
They can file an object. (pause)
With a barcode. (pause)
And an incident category. (pause)
So you attach yourself. (pause)
To the object. (pause)
You’re—politely—“associated mass.” (pause)
They won’t call it dehumanizing. (pause)
They’ll call it efficient. (pause)
On paper.
nodes.nextLine: The Coach points right, toward Intake Hall signage, as if pointing is a legally safer escort.
nodes.revisedLine:
Intake won’t file a person. (pause)
You’re not listed in any jurisdiction. (pause)
They’ll file an object. (pause)
Barcode. (pause)
Incident category. (pause)
So you attach yourself (pause)
to the object. (pause)
You’re—politely—“associated mass.” (pause)
Nobody’s gonna say “dehumanizing.” (pause)
It shows up as “efficient.” (pause)
On paper.
nodes.changeSummary: Preserved all facts and terms; shifted to more defensive, liability-aware phrasing.

nodes.priorLine: The Process Coach stands where you can’t tell if they’re helping you or helping throughput.
nodes.lineToEdit: Before you pick a window—don’t improvise a story. (pause) Stories make somebody responsible. (pause) Categories get you a receipt.
nodes.revisedLine: Before you step up—don’t improvise a story. (pause) Stories make somebody responsible. (pause) Categories get you a receipt.
nodes.changeSummary: Small adjustment for immediacy; kept the same warning about responsibility and categories/receipt.

nodes.priorLine: ask: Which window gets me standing?
nodes.lineToEdit:
Don’t say “standing” at glass.
Legal word. Bites.
nodes.nextLine: Window 0. (pause) Ask for a Temporary Existence Receipt. (pause) Don’t lead with “I’m a person.” (pause) Don’t lead with “I need access.” (pause) Give them something they can file. (pause) Once you’re fileable, you can get difficult.
nodes.revisedLine:
Don’t say “standing” at glass.
Legal word. Bites.
nodes.changeSummary: Line already matched the desired clipped, cautionary tone; left meaning intact.

nodes.priorLine:
Don’t say “standing” at glass.
Legal word. Bites.
nodes.lineToEdit: Window 0. (pause) Ask for a Temporary Existence Receipt. (pause) Don’t lead with “I’m a person.” (pause) Don’t lead with “I need access.” (pause) Give them something they can file. (pause) Once you’re fileable, you can get difficult.
nodes.revisedLine: Window 0. (pause) Ask for a Temporary Existence Receipt. (pause) Don’t open with “I’m a person.” (pause) Don’t open with “I need access.” (pause) Hand them something they can file. (pause) Once you’re fileable, you can get difficult.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept instructions and terms; swapped phrasing to sound more spoken and pressurized.

nodes.priorLine: ask: What happens if I pick wrong?
nodes.lineToEdit: They’ll redirect you.
nodes.nextLine: Or they’ll log you as an interruption. (pause) If you keep insisting on specifics. (pause) Worst case, you get an incident category. (pause) One you didn’t choose. (pause) Get yourself in the file. (pause) You’ll at least keep moving.
nodes.revisedLine: They’ll bounce you.
nodes.changeSummary: More colloquial, still means being redirected.

nodes.lineToEdit: Or they’ll log you as an interruption. (pause) If you keep insisting on specifics. (pause) Worst case, you get an incident category. (pause) One you didn’t choose. (pause) Get yourself in the file. (pause) You’ll at least keep moving.
nodes.revisedLine: Or they’ll log you as an interruption. (pause) If you keep insisting on specifics. (pause) Worst case you get an incident category. (pause) One you didn’t choose. (pause) Get yourself in the file. (pause) At least you keep moving.
nodes.changeSummary: Tightened cadence and reduced formality; kept the same risks and outcome. | Removed commas by ending the first beat with a period and dropping the comma after “Worst case,” to meet max_commas without changing meaning.

nodes.lineToEdit: Okay. Means you’ve got an employer.
nodes.nextLine: Still doesn’t mean the windows have to care. (pause) If you want this quiet, (pause) go to Window 0 (pause) and let Intake pretend (pause) you’re cargo for five minutes.
nodes.revisedLine: Alright. Means you’ve got an employer.
nodes.changeSummary: Minor tweak for a more natural response; meaning unchanged.

nodes.priorLine: Okay. Means you’ve got an employer.
nodes.lineToEdit: Still doesn’t mean the windows have to care. (pause) If you want this quiet, (pause) go to Window 0 (pause) and let Intake pretend (pause) you’re cargo for five minutes.
nodes.revisedLine: Doesn’t mean the windows care. (pause) You want this quiet, (pause) go to Window 0 (pause) and let Intake pretend (pause) you’re cargo for five minutes.
nodes.changeSummary: Simplified phrasing and kept the same direction and ‘cargo’ framing.

nodes.lineToEdit:
Fine.
Use the system’s label: “misrouted equipment transfer.”
nodes.nextLine:
Keep it short. (pause) No biography. (pause) No motive. (pause)
If you have to attach yourself, (pause) you’re “associated mass.” (pause)
Don’t describe it.
nodes.revisedLine:
Fine.
Use the system’s label: “misrouted equipment transfer.”
nodes.changeSummary: Already blunt and in-voice; left intact.

nodes.priorLine:
Fine.
Use the system’s label: “misrouted equipment transfer.”
nodes.lineToEdit:
Keep it short. (pause) No biography. (pause) No motive. (pause)
If you have to attach yourself, (pause) you’re “associated mass.” (pause)
Don’t describe it.
nodes.revisedLine:
Keep it tight. (pause) No biography. (pause) No motive. (pause)
If you have to attach yourself, (pause) you’re “associated mass.” (pause)
Don’t describe it.
nodes.changeSummary: Adjusted wording for a more spoken, impatient register; preserved constraints and term.

nodes.lineToEdit: You want fewer alarms? Keep it thin. (pause) Less detail. Less insistence. Less you.
nodes.nextLine: Go to Window 0. (pause) Ask what categories are accepted. (pause) Don’t argue about it on the record.
nodes.revisedLine: You want fewer alarms? Keep it thin. (pause) Less detail. Less insisting. Just… less you.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept meaning; made the rhythm messier and more human under pressure.

nodes.priorLine: You want fewer alarms? Keep it thin. (pause) Less detail. Less insistence. Less you.
nodes.lineToEdit: Go to Window 0. (pause) Ask what categories are accepted. (pause) Don’t argue about it on the record.
nodes.revisedLine: Go to Window 0. (pause) Ask what categories they’ll take. (pause) Don’t argue about it on the record.
nodes.changeSummary: Swapped formal wording for everyday shorthand; kept the same action and warning.

nodes.priorLine:
You present nothing to the reader.
The reader responds appropriately: not at all.
nodes.lineToEdit:
Yeah. (pause)
It doesn’t even reject you. (pause)
You didn’t register as input.
nodes.revisedLine:
Yeah. (pause)
It didn’t even flag you. (pause)
Reader got nothing to log.
nodes.changeSummary: Less tech-explainer, more paperwork framing; same point that nothing registered.

nodes.lineToEdit: Tokens run whatever gets audited. (pause) Doors. Kiosks. Windows—they answer artifacts. (pause) Not faces. (pause) You want to move. (pause) You do it in tokens.
nodes.revisedLine: Tokens run whatever gets audited. (pause) Doors. Kiosks. Windows—they answer artifacts. (pause) You want to move, (pause) you do it in tokens.
nodes.changeSummary: Removed the face/artifact contrast wording; kept the same audited-systems and token requirement.

nodes.lineToEdit: Sure. Escalate. (pause) It needs a category. (pause) Then you sit in the incident queue. (pause) Until the system decides your problem type. (pause) I'm not here to fight you. (pause) I'm throughput. (pause) Let me keep you moving.
nodes.revisedLine: Sure. Escalate. (pause) They’ll want a category. (pause) Then you sit in the incident queue (pause) till the system decides your problem type. (pause) I’m not here for a fight. (pause) I’m throughput. (pause) Let me keep you moving.
nodes.changeSummary: Made it sound more like a tired, practical warning; preserved queue/category/problem-type facts.

The system will accept. (pause)
They spit out a token. (pause)

Pick one that isn’t begging (pause)
for a life story. (pause)
Give them an incident category. (pause)
System takes it. (pause)
Token prints. (pause)
That’s what the doors listen to.
nodes.changeSummary: Same directions and outcome, varied the wording to avoid repetition and keep it spoken.
